Vezzy LLC.

Cofounder/Android Developer

Founded in July 2018, Vezzy LLC is a secondhand consumer-to-consumer marketplace app for individual universities. The company rivals FB Buy & Sell pages, with many added features and overall better user interface. Such features include a university authentication method to increase security, in-app payment and messaging for additional security and ease, a request and offer system, as well as instant purchasing and an all-inclusive profile. Built and operated by current students at Emory University and Georgia Tech, Vezzy is in the midst of successfully launching onto their first college campus - Emory University. Through two weeks, the app received 1.3k+ downloads and processed $3k+ transactions.

Tech:

Android Studio, Firebase Firestore, Firebase Realtime Database, and Algolia Search API

Check it out!
